describe: Sweden, located in Northern Europe, is known for its stunning natural landscapes, rich history, and high quality of life. It boasts a mix of modern cities and vast wilderness areas, offering a unique blend of urban and outdoor experiences.

cities.name: üèù Stockholm
cities.geographical_location: Located on the east coast of Sweden, spread across 14 islands connected by over 50 bridges.
cities.climate: Stockholm has a humid continental climate with cold winters and mild to warm summers.

cities.climate: Kiruna has a subarctic climate with long, cold winters and short, mild summers.
